attributes.action: Compel the 2012 Olympic organisers to produce an acceptable logo representing contemporary Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The logo created to represent Britain for the 2012 Olympics is awful, embarrassing and reflects nothing of our country, society, history or culture.

It should be scrapped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
